questions.question: What is the full form of RAM?
What is the difference between TCP and UDP?
options: TCP is connection-oriented and UDP is not
UDP is connection-oriented and TCP is not
questions.correct_answer: TCP is connection-oriented and UDP is not

questions.question: What is the difference between a compiler and an interpreter?
options: A compiler translates a program into machine code
An interpreter translates a program into machine code
A compiler translates a program into assembly language
An interpreter translates a program into assembly language
questions.correct_answer: A compiler translates a program into machine code

questions.question: What is the difference between a procedural language and an object-oriented language?
options: A procedural language is more structured than an object-oriented language
An object-oriented language is more structured than a procedural language
A procedural language is more flexible than an object-oriented language
An object-oriented language is more flexible than a procedural language
questions.correct_answer: An object-oriented language is more structured than a procedural language
